name: bard simple
matches: ^You feel as if the world has closed in on you after listening to \w+'s droning, repetitive isorhythm\.$
^(\w+) viciously jabs a Soulpiercer into you\.$
^With a wink, (\w+) recites \"Ode to Elixirs\" to you\.$
The songblessing upon the rapier sings out with a piercing high note.
The songblessing unleashes a stunning percussive blast.
The Contradanse melody swells sharply in your ear with a discombobulating sonic burst.
^\w+ eyes gleaming, \w+ smiles and quickly sings a jaunty limerick at you\.$
